Package com.lukflug.panelstudio

Class Container

java.lang.Object
com.lukflug.panelstudio.FocusableComponent
com.lukflug.panelstudio.Container
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component
public class Container
extends FocusableComponent
Base class for components containing other components (i.e. containers).

  • Method Details

    • addComponent

      public void addComponent​(Component component)
      Add a component to the container.
      Parameters:
      component - the component to be added

    • render

      public void render​(Context context)
      Render the container. Components are rendered in a column based on the height they specify via Context.setHeight(int). The horizontal border is defined by Renderer.getBorder(). The vertical space between to components is defined by Renderer.getOffset().
      Specified by:
      render in interface Component
      Overrides:
      render in class FocusableComponent
      Parameters:
      context - the Context for the component

      Overrides:

      Parameters:

      button - the button that changed its state
